name: Snowdrops
description:
❄This game is created especially for Winter Visual Novel Jam 2022❄

It is an adaptation of a Christmas story that tells how a stepmother sent her stepdaughter to the forest for snowdrops by order of the queen, on the eve of the new year.

Characters:

 

The Queen - Capricious and spoiled girl, likes to order everyone around.

 

The Professor - Mentor of the young Queen. He tries to teach her the wit of reason, but so far to no avail.

 

The Stepmother - Evil and greedy woman. She adores his daughter, whom he spoils in every possible way.

 

The Stepdaughter -  Smart, kind and hardworking girl. Always suffers the stepsister bullying.

 

The Stepsister - Harmful girl, giving trouble to her younger stepsister.

The Months brothers - just cool dudes... ☺

❆I am hard work and to make it interesting for you.❆ 

❆I wish you a merry Christmas and a happy new year!❆
